articles.title: American citizen Mark Frerichs freed from Afghanistan in prisoner swap with Taliban - ABC News
articles.description: Negotiations for the release of American engineer Mark Frerichs involved the release of Bashir Noorzai, a member of the Taliban who has been under US captivity for more than 17 years.
articles.content: Afghanistan's Taliban has freed American engineer Mark Frerichs in exchange for an Afghan tribal leader linked to the Taliban who the United States had imprisoned for drug smuggling since 2005, offic… [+3557 chars]

articles.title: Family of American says he was freed by Taliban in swap - World News - Castanet.net
articles.description: An American contractor held hostage in Afghanistan for more than two years by the Taliban has been released, his family said Monday, as a Taliban drug lord jailed by the United States was also freed and returned to Kabul.

articles.description: Aaron Judge hit his 58th and 59th home runs of the season to move within two of Roger Maris’ American League record with 16 games remaining and lead the New York Yankees over the Milwaukee Brewers 12-8 on Sunday.
